column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Great atmosphere. Ramen was okay
column2: I had the jinya pork belly and my boyfriend had the sprout ramen with pork belly. Never had pork belly that wasn't seared and hardly any meat
column3: maybe that's their style but it was so mushy and fatty. Would recommend requesting them to sear it if possible! Also the pork belly bun bao
column4: same thing. I personally don't like huge chunks of uncooked fat
column5: my only complaint! Everything else was great!
